body_html:
Jenkins, test this please.
…
On Thu, Oct 5, 2017, 10:52 PM Yong Tang ***@***.***> wrote: ***@***.**** commented on this pull request. ------------------------------ In tensorflow/contrib/ffmpeg/default/ffmpeg_lib.cc <#13242 (comment)> : > @@ -208,22 +311,23 @@ string GetTempFilename(const string& extension) { } struct stat statbuf; if (!stat(dir, &statbuf) && S_ISDIR(statbuf.st_mode)) { - return io::JoinPath(dir, StrCat("tmp_file_", getpid(), ".", extension)); + if (extension.length()) { + return io::JoinPath(dir, StrCat("tmp_file_", getpid(), ".", extension)); Thanks. Done. — You are receiving this because you were assigned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#13242 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AT_SbWGUzN4odxVQnbcDW65cnGAf84iUks5spcAFgaJpZM4PhHLN> .
body:
Jenkins, test this please.

On Thu, Oct 5, 2017, 10:52 PM Yong Tang <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> *@yongtang* commented on this pull request.
> ------------------------------
>
> In tensorflow/contrib/ffmpeg/default/ffmpeg_lib.cc
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/13242#discussion_r143113330>
> :
>
> > @@ -208,22 +311,23 @@ string GetTempFilename(const string& extension) {
>      }
>      struct stat statbuf;
>      if (!stat(dir, &statbuf) && S_ISDIR(statbuf.st_mode)) {
> -      return io::JoinPath(dir, StrCat("tmp_file_", getpid(), ".", extension));
> +      if (extension.length()) {
> +        return io::JoinPath(dir, StrCat("tmp_file_", getpid(), ".", extension));
>
> Thanks. Done.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were assigned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/13242#discussion_r143113330>,
> or mute the thread

> .
